review.comment: Empathic, comforting, patient and great communication! All key factors for finding that perfect match when it comes to self care. I would highly recommend Wanda and the services provided!

This was my first experience with a psychologist. I was really nervous at first because its difficult trying something new, but Wanda was really kind and she explained the steps and put me at ease. She is easy to talk to and she is super knowledgable and helped me a lot. I have recommended her to many of my friends and I will continue to - Thanks Wanda for getting my feet back on the ground after a very stressful time in my life!

I really wasn’t sure about seeing a psychologist until I met Wanda. She seemed to understand what I was going through and she really helped me a lot with my anxiety. She gave me the tools to work through situations on my own.  I still need to work on things but the tools she provided have really improved my quality of life.
Wanda is such great at getting me to talk about myself.  She is so accepting and welcoming.  I recommend her services.
Wonder Wanda she the best!!! Great listener and fun to be with. Highly recommended!!! Call and book your appointments soon...
Wanda is passionate about her clients and their well being. She is caring, empathetic, skilled, thoughtful and committed to helping you heal and grow.
review.review_reply: Thank you Barb for your very thoughtful and kind words!

review.comment: I have known Wanda professionally and personally for many years. In this time, I have also had the opportunity to see how Wanda relates to clients and have observed her warm, curious, compassionate nature. I believe Wanda has a tremendous skill set and ability to work with a variety of client populations through a non judgmental approach. I refer clients to Wanda knowing she will provide the best care.
review.review_reply: Awe thank you Veronica, such kind words!

review.comment: Wanda is the kindest most compassionate psychologist, who really values and cares about her clients. She is well versed in various types of therapy such as trauma, addictions and couples therapy to name a few. Wanda has strived to build a practice that provides a safe space for every one of her clients. I highly recommend ReDiscover Psyc Services to help you overcome your barriers and move forward with a positive balance.
review.review_reply: You are very kind and compassionate yourself Andrea, thank you for your thoughtful review!

review.comment: Wanda is compassionate and empathetic. She’s easy to talk to and cares about her clients. I’d definitely recommend giving her a chance, you won’t regret it.
review.review_reply: Thank you Shelley for your find words and encouragement!

review.comment: Very friendly and Really helped me understand things from a different perspective. Highly recommend
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your support! I am happy I was able to help!

review.comment: I worked along side Wanda for over 4 years. I can attest that she has an amazing rapport, is considerate, confidential, and ethical in her practice. She has an ease in her approach that makes her comfortable to be around and affective in her service delivery.
review.review_reply: Thank you Ryan, I will miss working with you! I am so happy that our clients are still able to access you. You are amazing at what you do!

review.comment: Both ethical and trustworthy, Wanda is a wonderfully empathetic and compassionate therapist, who has excellent communication skills, and will work with you to navigate life’s challenges. As well, I really appreciate her cross-cultural sensitivity, patience, and problem-solving abilities. I highly recommend her.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words Sarah!

review.comment: Excellent. Listens, knowledgeable, compassionate. Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thank you Taneil for your kind words.

review.comment: Wanda is very good at what she does. She offered some much needed clarity and insight into what I was going through. I highly recommend her to anyone.
review.review_reply: Thank you Chris for your kind words!

review.comment: Very positive and helpful experience. She helped me get through a really tough last year.
review.review_reply: Thank you Anthony for your kind words!
